data.comment: The match is underway at Matmut Atlantique.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 3, In Bordeaux, Bordeaux push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frank Schneider awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Mehdi Zerkane hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Bordeaux for Bordeaux.
Throw-in high up the field for Bordeaux in Bordeaux.
Throw-in for Brestois at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 10, In Bordeaux Brestois drive forward through Franck Honorat. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Bordeaux's Josh Maja is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Brestois.
Goal kick for Brestois at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 27, Josh Maja for Bordeaux gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 27, Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Bordeaux to check on Romain Perraud, who is grimacing with pain.
Romain Perraud has recovered and rejoins the match in Bordeaux.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
Bordeaux are coming forward and Hwang Ui-Jo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 31, Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 37, Brestois's Romain Faivre gets in a shot on goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paul Baysse (Bordeaux) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 39, Frank Schneider awards Brestois a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Important block from the Bordeaux defence as Jean-Kevin Duverne fires in a strike for Brestois.
In the minute 41, Brendan Chardonnet (Brestois) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
In the minute 43, Ronael Pierre-Gabriel (Brestois) has received a first yellow card.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Bordeaux just outside Brestois's area.
Free kick Bordeaux.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Matmut Atlantique.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 46, Brestois have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In Bordeaux, Hwang Ui-Jo of Bordeaux is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Bordeaux Bordeaux attack through Hwang Ui-Jo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, Brestois have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Free kick Brestois.
In the minute 52, Brestois are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Brestois push upfield but Frank Schneider quickly pulls them for offside.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 55, Brestois advance rapidly upfield but Frank Schneider blows for offside.
Toma Basic of Bordeaux smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
In the minute 58, Bordeaux drives forward and Youssouf Sabaly gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Bordeaux's Hwang Ui-Jo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Brestois at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 60, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brestois's Jean-Kevin Duverne has been booked in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux drive upfield and Hwang Ui-Jo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Brestois defender.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
The home team replace Josh Maja with Jimmy Briand.
In the minute 63, Frank Schneider signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Brestois's half.
Nicolas De Preville is replacing Hwang Ui-Jo for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Toma Basic hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Bordeaux in Bordeaux.
In the minute 66, Bordeaux's Nicolas De Preville breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Throw-in Brestois.
In the minute 68, Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's third substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Yacine Adli replacing Toma Basic.
Bordeaux make their fourth substitution with Remi Oudin replacing Mehdi Zerkane.
In Bordeaux Bordeaux attack through Hatem Ben Arfa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 69, Frank Schneider awards Brestois a goal kick.
Romain Faivre for Brestois drives towards goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Brestois.
Hatem Ben Arfa (Bordeaux) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 71, Haris Belkebla (Brestois) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 73, Hatem Ben Arfa (Bordeaux) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gaetan Charbonnier is replacing Steve Mounie for the away team.
In the minute 75, Brestois needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Bordeaux's Hatem Ben Arfa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Brestois have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Brestois pushes forward through Irvin Cardona, whose finish on goal is saved.
Brestois drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Cristian Battocchio is on a sub for Irvin Cardona for Brestois.
In the minute 77, Jeremy Le Douaron is on a sub for Franck Honorat for Brestois.
Brestois are pushing forward but Cristian Battocchio's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 83, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Jimmy Briand (Bordeaux) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hatem Ben Arfa scores to make it 1-0 at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 84, Yacine Adli with an assist there.
Bordeaux pushes forward through Yacine Adli, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Hatem Ben Arfa with Maxime Poundje.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Matmut Atlantique the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
The away team have replaced Paul Lasne with Heriberto Tavares. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oliver Dall'Oglio.
